title: Rofl at parties in normals
body: Ahh normals, where you can play with your friends and have fun - Riot's intended idea. The actuality is, this is where losers with limited friends play, troll, and be extremely toxic together. I would usually say most people are fine and it's a few bad apples that spoil the bunch, but that really isn't the case. Please deliver on instant review of cases Riot, so we can go back to playing a fun game instead of babysitting teens. At the very least, pay us to babysit them as they cry and throw shit around?

replies.body:
Although I agree that normals have quite a few trolls lurking there, but that's kinda just the thing with solo queue in general and not necessarily only concerning Norms.

And I disagree with the statement saying that someone who has limited friends is simply a loser like you described, nor should the case be about player age in general.

"this is where losers with limited friends play"


Because online friends make you cooler than the other kids.

You daft screb.
